name: Stanford CoreNLP
features: Support for Multiple Languages (Arabic, Chinese, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, and Spanish)

pricing.model: Free and open-source (GNU GPL v3 or later). Commercial license available for proprietary software distributors.

commercial_license.availability: Available from Stanford. Contact java-nlp-support@lists.stanford.edu for details.
commercial_license.notes: Required for use in proprietary software distributed to others.

pros: Can be accessed via various APIs (command-line, Java, third-party, web service)
cons: Commercial license required for proprietary software distribution
May require more coding compared to some commercial NLP services

technical_specifications.api_type: Java API, REST API (via web service)
technical_specifications.license: GNU GPL v3 or later (commercial license available)

user_reviews.summary: Requires further research from external review sites (e.g., G2, Capterra).

integration_capabilities: Can be integrated with various programming languages via third-party APIs or web service
scalability: Scalability depends on the specific implementation and hardware
